text: A-One is a mandopop group created in 2008 under the label Hong Kong Kiss-star entertainment Beijing company (香港Kiss Star娱乐北京有限公司). ==Names== A number of names have been used for this group. * A-One (昆虫一族) * A-One (昆虫组合) * A-One (中国昆虫) ==Career== Originally Gillian Chung was scheduled to be a performer at the 2008 Summer Olympics opening ceremony. But due to the Edison Chen photo scandal, director Zhang Yimou had replaced Twins with A-One.Sydney morning herald. "Dirty downloads: diva axed from Olympic ceremony The Sydney Morning Herald, 26 February 2008. Retrieved 21 July 2008. A-One did not make their international debut on 8 August as part of the ceremony. After 2 years of training the group debuted after Hunan Satellite TV show Happy camp (快乐大本营).Kiss-star. "Kiss-star.com ." A-One. Retrieved on 5 January 2009. ==Members== The group members are counted as 3+x where the most popular 3 members are in the group. Sometimes it may have 5 or more members. There had been 10 members in total. The official website describe this fan selection style as democratic (民主) for the 21st century. ==Album== * Jeet Kune Do (截拳道) ==References== ==External links== * Official site * Tudou video sample * Youtube video sample Category:Chinese musical groups
title: A-One (band)
